映り: (うつり) - (esp. 写り) projection/reflection/image/reception (e.g. TV)/picture quality; (esp.映り) match/harmony
映り行く: (うつりゆく) - to change; to shift; to come and go
映り込み: (うつりこみ) - background reflections (e.g. on a window); reflected glare
映る: (うつる) - to be reflected; to harmonize with (harmonise); to come out (photo); to be projected; to be displayed (on a screen)
映倫: (えいりん) - Motion Picture Code of Ethics Committee
映像: (eizou) - image (on a screen), picture (por exemplo, em uma TV); video, film, footage , image (on a screen), picture (e.g. on a TV); video, film, footage; reflection; image (in one's mind), mental picture
映像信号: (えいぞうしんごう) - (computer) video signal
映像品質: (えいぞうひんしつ) - image quality; picture quality
映像圧縮: (えいぞうあっしゅく) - image compression
映像文化: (えいぞうぶんか) - (yoji) visual culture; culture of visual images; (screen) image culture
映写室: (えいしゃしつ) - projection room; projection booth
映写機: (えいしゃき) - movie projector; film projector; cine projector
映日果: (イチヂク) - common fig (Ficus carica); fig; fig tree
映画ファン: (えいがファン) - cinema fan; cinema-goer; cinephile; film aficionado; film buff; film fan; movie buff; movie fan
映画会: (えいがかい) - film society; movie club
映画俳優: (えいがはいゆう) - movie (film, screen) actor or actress
映画化: (えいがか) - making (book) into film; making screen version

映画研究: (えいがけんきゅう) - film studies; cinema studies
映画評論家: (えいがひょうろんか) - film critic; movie critic

映画館: (えいがかん) - movie theatre; movie theater; cinema
映研: (えいけん) - film studies; cinema studies
春: (evitar/haru) - springtime , spring, springtime; New Year; prime (of one's life, etc.); adolescence, puberty
春たけなわ: (はるたけなわ) - spring is in full swing
春の七草: (はるのななくさ) - seven vernal flowers (Java water dropwort, shepherd's purse, Jersey cudweed, common chickweed, Japanese nipplewort, turnip, and daikon)
春の土: (はるのつち) - bare ground revealed by melting snow
春の山: (はるのやま) - misty mountain with blossoming buds and flowers as it appears in spring
春の日: (はるのひ) - day of spring; spring sun
春の星: (はるのほし) - star in the sky on a spring night
春の暮: (はるのくれ) - spring evening; end of spring
春の月: (はるのつき) - spring moon; misty moon
春の水: (はるのみず) - lakes and torrents of spring (overflowing with water)
春の海: (はるのうみ) - calm sea of spring
春の湊: (はるのみなと) - end of spring
春の野: (はるのの) - calm fields of spring
春の野芥子: (ハルノノゲシ) - sow thistle (Sonchus oleraceus); milk thistle
春の雪: (はるのゆき) - spring snow (usu. large snowflakes)
春の雲: (はるのくも) - cloud floating in a spring sky
春めく: (はるめく) - to become spring-like; to show signs of spring
春をひさぐ: (はるをひさぐ) - to engage in prostitution
春を売る: (はるをうる) - to become a prostitute
春を販ぐ: (はるをひさぐ) - to engage in prostitution
春を鬻ぐ: (はるをひさぐ) - to engage in prostitution
春一番: (はるいちばん) - first storm of spring; strong winds during the change from winter to spring
春休: (はるやすみ) - spring break; spring vacation
春休み: (はるやすみ) - spring break; spring vacation
春光: (しゅんこう) - spring sunlight; scenery of spring
春分: (しゅんぶん) - vernal equinox; spring equinox
春分の日: (しゅんぶんのひ) - Vernal Equinox Holiday (Mar 20 or 21)
春分点: (しゅんぶんてん) - the vernal equinox (the equinoctal point)
春坊: (はるぼう) - nickname for such names as Haruo or Haruko
春場所: (はるばしょ) - {sumo} spring (March) tournament, held in Osaka
春塵: (しゅんじん) - spring dust; frost and snow that's blown like dust in the air by the spring wind
春夏の交: (しゅんかのこう) - change from spring to summer
春夏秋冬: (しゅんかしゅうとう) - (yoji) spring, summer, autumn (fall) and winter; the four seasons
春季キャンプ: (しゅんきキャンプ) - {baseb} spring training camp
春季皇霊祭: (しゅんきこうれいさい) - imperial ceremony of ancestor worship formerly held on the vernal equinox
春官: (しゅんかん) - Ministry of Rites (Zhou-dynasty China)
春宵一刻: (しゅんしょういっこく) - (yoji) a moment of time in a spring evening (is worth a thousand pieces of gold)
春宵一刻値千金: (しゅんしょういっこくあたいせんきん) - a moment of time in a spring evening is worth a thousand pieces of gold
春寒: (しゅんかん) - cold weather in early spring
春山: (しゅんざん) - mountain in early spring; mountain that has the appearance of spring
春待ち月: (はるまちづき) - twelfth lunar month
